title: Oathbreaker
content:
uicide. Act 3 Agree to help Devilish Ox but failed to do so. Side with Gortash, and betray him. Side with Orin, and betray her. Promise to Jaheira to save Minsc, but failed. Betray Mayrina. Choose to become the Unholy Assassin in the Murder Tribunal. Activating the collared workers' kill switch in the Foundry Betraying the Wave Mistress

Help Sazza escape or kill her in dialogue. Promise to help tieflings and betray them. Betraying Minthara after you agreed to help her. Let Auntie Ethel escape f
